entry.title: WEATHER ADVISORY , Nipigon
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 04:34 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: -3.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Cameron Falls 08:00 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
Temperature: -3.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 101.5 kPa falling
Humidity: 89 %
Wind Chill: -7
Dewpoint: -5.2°C
Wind: SSE 9 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Wednesday: Snow at times heavy. High plus 2.
entry.summary: Snow at times heavy becoming mixed with periods of drizzle late this afternoon. Local blowing snow this morning and early this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 to 10 cm except locally 15 cm over higher terrain. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light this afternoon. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 14 this morning. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Periods of snow mixed with drizzle early this evening and ending near midnight then cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this evening. Low minus 9. Wind chill minus 16 overnight. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries early in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 20 km/h becoming light in the morning. High zero. Wind chill minus 16 in the morning. UV index 3 or moderate. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EDT Wednesday 22 March 2023
